metadata.title: MYDS - Malaysia Government Design System
metadata.description: The design foundation for building official Malaysian government websites, MYDS provides beautiful pre-built components which streamline development and ensure consistency.

description.hero: The design foundation for building official Malaysian government websites, MYDS provides beautiful pre-built components which streamline development and ensure consistency.
description.content1: A structured collection of reusable components which adheres to design standards and principles, providing a foundation for digital product development.

1.title: Beautiful Government Sites
1.description: Clean and minimalist, ensuring that information is easy to find, and services are easy to use.

2.title: Rapid Development
2.description: Pre-built visual and functional elements for efficient prototyping and development.

3.title: Cost Savings
3.description: Accelerated design and development, saving valuable taxpayer ringgits.

4.title: Compliant with Standards
4.description: Full adherence to Jabatan Digital Negara’s design principles and service architecture.

5.title: Accessible by Design
5.description: Out-of-the-box adherence to WCAG and best accessibility practices.

6.title: Trusted by Citizens
6.description: Familiar look and feel, increasing citizens’ trust in the government’s digital presence.

1.title: Government sites will look clean & well-designed
1.description: A Design System ensures that all government websites maintain a consistent, clean, and well-designed appearance, enhancing usability, accessibility, and the overall digital presence of Malaysia's government services.

2.title: Pre-built components let you focus on the product
2.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

3.title: Fewer tax ringgits will be spent on government sites
3.description: Frontend development for government products will be much faster and cheaper, which saves taxpayer money.

cover.title: How are we rolling out Malaysia’s first design system?
cover.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

1.title: Digital Ministry website launched
1.description: Proof-of-concept for the Malaysia Government Design System, with skin in the game using our own official site!

2.title: MYDS (Beta) launched
2.description: Figma opened for public inspection and feedback

3.title: Development of Site Builder
3.description: The engine behind implementation of the design system. Agencies will use this site builder (i.e. a CMS) to populate content.

4.title: School Sites Revamp
4.description: Proof-of-concept for the scalability of our design system and site builder, working with 10,000 schools nationwide.

5.title: Agency Sites Revamp
5.description: Roll-out across government agencies. The site builder (including hosting) will be completely free for the public sector.

6.title: Final Stakeholder Consultation
6.description: Preview and testing with members of the local tech community and industry, as well as other public sector officers.

7.title: Full Launch of MYDS
7.description: Production-ready design system now ready to be used for any future product. A new era for gov.my sites begins!

Disclaimer.desc: The Ministry of Digital is not responsible for any loss or damage incurred from using the information on this portal.

Privacy.your_privacy_desc: This page explains the privacy policy that encompasses the use and protection of information submitted by visitors. If you make a transaction or send an email containing personal information, this information may be shared with other public agencies to assist in providing more effective and efficient services, for example in resolving complaints that require feedback from other agencies.
Privacy.collected_info_desc:
No personal information will be collected while you are browsing this portal except for information submitted by you via email.

What happens if I link to other portals/websites?

This portal contains links to other portals/websites. This privacy policy applies only to this website. It should be noted that the portals/websites linked may have different privacy policies, and visitors are advised to review and understand the privacy policies for each portal/website they visit.
Privacy.policy_change_desc: If this privacy policy is amended, the amendments will be updated on this page. By frequently browsing this page, you will be updated on the information collected, how it is used, and under certain conditions, how the information is shared with other parties.
Privacy.personal_data_act_desc: Jabatan Perlindungan Data Peribadi (JPDP) is an agency under the Ministry of Digital established on May 16, 2011, after Parliament passed the relevant Bill on the Personal Data Protection Act 2010 (APDP), Act 709. The main responsibility of this department is to supervise the processing of individuals' personal data involved in commercial transactions by data users to prevent misuse and misappropriation by interested parties. The security of users' personal data must be protected to prevent any form of misuse regarding the storage or processing of individuals' personal data. The public and private sectors in Malaysia are subject to commercial transactions under this APDP. In enforcing the APDP, JPDP has mandated that all categories of personal data users, whether individual or private entities, except for the Government, must officially register to protect the rights of users and the public. JPDP is headed by a Director-General, assisted by a Deputy Director-General. There are three main divisions in JPDP, namely the Registration and Operations Division, the Monitoring Division, and the Legal Division. For further information, please go to http://www.pdp.gov.my.
